channel.title: Trading from the same ip

item.title: Trading from the same ip
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

I’m not 100% sure try
public void tradeReq(int id) {
if (!server.trading) {
sM(“Trading has been temporarily disabled”);
return;
}
if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
if (other.inTrade) {
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
trade_reqId = 0;
return;
}
}

how to i turn this off i’ve tried removing it but i get compile errors n shizz
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Trading from the same ip
item.dc:creator: @arcuza arcuza
item.description:
@arcuza wrote:

}

public void tradeReq(int id) {
	if (!server.trading) {
		sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled");
		return;
	}
	client other = (client) handler.players[id];
			if (connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(other.connectedFrom)
                            || other.connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connectedFrom)) {
                    sM("Same IP found, you may not trade.");
                    return;
            }                              
	if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		if (other.inTrade) {
			sM("Other player is busy at the moment.");
			trade_reqId = 0;
			return;
		}
	}

how to i turn this off i’ve tried removing it but i get compile errors n shizz

Read full topic
